system.effect: Add X to the relevent characteristic bonus. Gain a bomus number of Degrees of Success on any successful characteristic that has the Unnatural Characteristic Trait equal to half of X. Examples: Unnatural Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, Agility, Intelligence, Perception,Willpower, and Fellowship.

description.value: Add X to the relevent characteristic bonus. Gain a bomus number of Degrees of Success on any successful characteristic that has the Unnatural Characteristic Trait equal to half of X. Examples: Unnatural Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, Agility, Intelligence, Perception,Willpower, and Fellowship.
